alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Gates of the Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 5:15PM MST until December 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow expected expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains, Little Belt and Highwood Mountains, Cascade County below 5000ft, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing and drifting snow Wednesday may significantly reduce visibility and cause partial lane blockages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Winter Weather Advisory for Snow that is in effect until 5 PM MST this afternoon will be allowed to expire.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Gates of the Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains
